N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 §§ 325-3.4 - Bureau facilities

State Regulations

The bureau shall be well-housed with sufficient space, light and air and shall conform to reasonable sanitary requirements. Proper
facilities in the form of personnel for assistance in emergencies, instruments, sterilizers, dressings, drugs, shall be available at all times and in amounts
proportionate to the size of the plant and the number of employees. Such
facilities shall be adequate for more than mere emergency care and for the more
severe type of industrial injury. Notes
